title: Burning Hands
contents: text | Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
text | The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.
text | +1d6 damage for each slot above 1st

title: Cunning Action
contents: text | You can take a bonus action on each of your turns in combat. This action can be used only to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.
text | You can also use the bonus action to make a Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check, use your thieves' tools to disarm a trap or open a lock, or take the Use an Object action.
